text: @AJEnglish Nobody makes me laugh like @realDonaldTrump through his actions -When he is shunning those "troublesome" journalists or when he is playing along with expert advice on COVID-19 management & suddenly realizes his "compliance" action could affect his re-election, he takes a u-turn!
